greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of A011371(x) = x - A000120(x) needed to reach an odd number, when starting from x = n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: If n is odd, a(n) = 0, if n is even, a(n) = 1 + a(A011371(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 05 2019
